Title: 9 AI Predictions from Jensen Huang
Description:
Today’s five‑minute headlines cover the strongest signal yet that GPT‑5 will drop in early August, GitHub’s Spark entry into vibe coding, Satya Nadella’s morale memo amid Microsoft layoffs, and fresh controversy around Google’s Windsurf acqui‑hire. Then we zoom out with Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, who lays out nine sweeping forecasts—from an AI‑driven wealth boom and twin‑factory industries to a multi‑trillion‑dollar infrastructure rush—that sketch the next decade of AI disruption and opportunity.
